extension.name: Flexible Jobs
extension.description: Improves the flexibility of scheduled jobs by adding "Yearly", "Quarterly", "Monthly", and "Weekly" run frequencies. It also allows one to specify a specific date/time that a scheduled job should first/next run.
extension.comments: This extension is NOT compatible with the upcoming 4.7 release. But that's OK, since this functionality is now part of core as of version 4.7.beta6. If you upgrade to 4.7 and this extension is enabled, it will automatically be disabled to avoid conflict.
